Title: The Dark Heart of the Mogu
Description:
Dear $p,

We have always known the mogu to be dark and sinister. Your research however would imply that they are far worse.

If you visit us at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms we can add this contribution to your personal collection.

Thank you for your diligence!

Sincerely,

Lorewalker Cho
ObjectivesText: Bring The Dark Heart of the Mogu to Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Kowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
